prompt.content: What is Microsoftâ€™s (NASDAQ: MSFT) Adjusted EBITDA for the fiscal year ended June 30, 2025? Express the answer in $M rounded and express as a whole number.

messages.content: [{"criteria":"Operating income extracted as $128,528M from the income statement","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Depreciation, amortization & other expense extracted as $34,153M from the cash flow statement"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"EBITDA calculation shown as $128,528M + $34,153M = $162,681M"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Statement to look for non-GAAP adjustments such as stock-based compensation and non-cash investment gains/losses"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Stock-based compensation extracted as $11,974M from the cash flow statement"},{"criteria":"Net recognized losses on investments & derivatives extracted as $609M from the cash flow statement","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Adjusted EBITDA calculation shown as $162,681M + $11,974M + $609M = $175,264M"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Final Answer presented as $175,264 million"}]
